channel.title: Bountiful Money
channel.description: Save money, budget according to your values, and experience financial bliss

item.title: Are You Afraid To Look At Your Debt?
item.description: In my last post I wrote a bit about changing our perceptions about the inevitability of debt, but today I want to talk about a common problem people have with debt: Fear of looking at your debt. When you can’t look at your debt, it is impossible to do anything about your debt! So let’s dive in and see why this fear exists, and what you can do about it.
